this is to test rendering model_diff in `.Rmd`.

```{r message = F}
devtools::load_all()
source("setup-workflow-ref.R")
cleanup()
create_all_models()
```

## no args

with no opts it renders but looks kinda ugly.

```{r }
# no opts
model_diff(mod1, mod2)
```

with `results = "asis"` it renders nicely.
```{r results = "asis"}
# asis
model_diff(mod1, mod2)
```

## .viewer = TRUE

if you pass `.viewer = T` and _don't_ set `results = "asis"` then it renders nothing.
```{r}
# no opts
model_diff(mod1, mod2, .viewer = T)
```

if you pass `.viewer = T` and set `results = "asis"` then it ignores the `.viewer` arg and renders as it should.

```{r results = "asis"}
# asis
model_diff(mod1, mod2, .viewer = T)
```
